pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pathways Longitudinal and Differential Analysis in Metabolomics // Perform a differential analysis at pathway level based on metabolite quantifications and information on pathway metabolite composition. The method, described in Guilmineau et al (2025) doi:10.1186/s12859-025-06118-z is based on a Principal Component Analysis step and on a linear mixed model. Automatic query of metabolic pathways is also implemented.
